Bash(/c/Python314/python -c "
import base64
script = b''''''
from pathlib import Path
BASE = ""c:\\\\Users\\\\Umar Fadhil Ramadhan\\\\OneDrive\\\\Documents\\\\ayakasir\\\\app\\\\src\\\\main\\\\java\\\\com\\\\ayakasir\\\\app""
edits = []
SEP = ""\\n""

def add\(p, marker_before, new_line_content\):
    edits.append\(\(p, marker_before, new_line_content\)\)

entities = [
    \(""core/data/local/entity/CategoryEntity.kt"",
     ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""category_type\\\\""\) val categoryType: String = \\\\""MENU\\\\"",""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/ProductEntity.kt"",
     ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""product_type\\\\""\) val productType: String = \\\\""MENU_ITEM\\\\"",""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/VariantEntity.kt"",
     ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""price_adjustment\\\\""\) val priceAdjustment: Long = 0,""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/InventoryEntity.kt"",
     ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""min_qty\\\\""\) val minQty: Int = 0,""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/ProductComponentEntity.kt"",
     ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""sort_order\\\\""\) val sortOrder: Int = 0,""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/VendorEntity.kt"",
     ""    val address: String? = null,""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/GoodsReceivingEntity.kt"",
     ""    val notes: String? = null,""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/GoodsReceivingItemEntity.kt"",
     ""    val unit: String = \\\\""pcs\\\\"", // pcs, kg, liter, or custom""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/TransactionEntity.kt"",
     ""    val status: String, // COMPLETED or VOIDED""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/TransactionItemEntity.kt"",
     ""    val subtotal: Long,""\),
    \(""core/data/local/entity/CashWithdrawalEntity.kt"",
     ""    val date: Long,""\),
]

sync_status_entity = ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""sync_status\\\\""\) val syncStatus: String = SyncStatus.PENDING.name,""
restaurant_id_entity = ""    @ColumnInfo\(name = \\\\""restaurant_id\\\\""\) val restaurantId: String = \\\\""\\\\"",""

dtos = [
    ""core/data/remote/dto/CategoryDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/ProductDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/VariantDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/InventoryDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/ProductComponentDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/VendorDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/GoodsReceivingDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/GoodsReceivingItemDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/TransactionDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/TransactionItemDto.kt"",
    ""core/data/remote/dto/CashWithdrawalDto.kt"",
]

sync_status_dto = ""    @SerialName\(\\\\""sync_status\\\\""\) val syncStatus: String = \\\\""SYNCED\\\\"",""
restaurant_id_dto = ""    @SerialName\(\\\\""restaurant_id\\\\""\) val restaurantId: String = \\\\""\\\\"",""

for \(rel, before_line\) in entities:
    old = before_line + ""\\n"" + sync_status_entity
    new = before_line + ""\\n"" + restaurant_id_entity + ""\\n"" + sync_status_entity
    edits.append\(\(rel, old, new\)\)

for rel in dtos:
    old = sync_status_dto
    new = restaurant_id_dto + ""\\n"" + sync_status_dto
    edits.append\(\(rel, old, new\)\)

for rel_path, old, new in edits:
    full_path = Path\(BASE\) / rel_path.replace\(""/"", ""\\\\\\\\""\)
    content = full_path.read_text\(encoding=""utf-8""\)
    if old not in content:
        print\(""WARN: pattern not found in "" + rel_path\)
        continue
    new_content = content.replace\(old, new, 1\)
    full_path.write_text\(new_content, encoding=""utf-8""\)
    print\(""DONE: "" + rel_path\)

print\(""ALL_DONE""\)
''''''
print\(base64.b64encode\(script\).decode\(\)\)
")

Bash(/c/Python314/python -c "
import base64, subprocess, sys
b64 = ''''
decoded = base64.b64decode\(b64\)
exec\(decoded\)
")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "
$script = @''
import sys, io
sys.stdout = io.TextIOWrapper\(sys.stdout.buffer, encoding=chr\(34\)+chr\(117\)+chr\(116\)+chr\(102\)+chr\(45\)+chr\(56\)+chr\(34\)\)
''@
Write-Output $script
")
